meanings.definition: Surpassing all others; very distinguished in some way.
meanings.sent1: The preeminent student in the class always gets the highest grades.
meanings.sent2: She is considered the preeminent expert in the field of astronomy.
meanings.sent3: The preeminent chef in town can turn even the simplest ingredients into a gourmet meal.
meanings.sent4: His preeminent talent on the piano leaves audiences in awe.
meanings.sent5: The preeminent mountain in the range stands tall and majestic.

meanings.definition: Superior to or notable above all others.
meanings.sent1: The preeminent building in the city is a symbol of architectural excellence.
meanings.sent2: Her preeminent leadership skills make her the perfect candidate for the job.
meanings.sent3: The preeminent joke of the evening had everyone laughing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: His preeminent speed on the track earned him the title of champion.
meanings.sent5: The preeminent star in the sky shines brighter than all the others combined.
